changed_products.title: Bespoke Cut - Up to 20M Super Length Continuous Run LED COB Strip IP65 8W 3000K Warm White Warm White 3000K / 5.50 Metre - Uno Lighting

title: Bespoke Cut - Up to 20M Super Length Continuous Run LED COB Strip IP44 8W 3000K Warm White Warm White 3000K / 5.50 Metre - Uno Lighting
Bespoke Cut - Up to 20M Super Length Continuous Run LED COB Strip IP65 8W 3000K Warm White Warm White 3000K / 5.50 Metre - Uno Lighting
description:
For a customised strip quotation, kindly email your requirements to sales@uno-lighting.com 


 20 Meters Continuous Run Built in IC super length COB strip. Super Long Length, almost no voltage drop for 20 Meters run, it would only need one end power. Linear Light, no dark spot, no short circuit risk.Flicker Free for all 24V constant driver, support PMW.

 8W per Meter, IP44, 3000K Warm Whtie, 384 LEDs per meter, 20 Meters Reel, 24V Super Bright LED Strip, 720m/M, CRI 90, Dimension:10mm x 20000mm. Seamless Light, Dot free array- continuous light output from LED chips, invisible LED chips 


 Long lasting premium LED strip in commercial grade suitable for professional installations. Available in Warm White 2700K, 3000K, Cool White 4000K, Day Light 6000K.

 Dimmable through remote control, Dimmable Drivers or through our smart controller a smart speaker/ device (Sold Separately).

 All Strips cannot be plug direct to the Mains, it will require an 24V Drivers to power.

 This product listing is for LED strip only, power supply/driver are sold separately.

 This item is not supplied with a plug, it is supplied with cables ready for a plug to be fitted or hard wired into the mains supply by a qualified professional

 2 Years Warranty.

 Warranty extended to 3 Years if purchased with our Aluminum Profile. (For optimal performance and to prevent premature failure, we recommend using aluminum extrusion with all LED strip installations.)

 Caution: It is recommended to run a maximum of 20 meterscontinuouslyto avoid any voltage drop and premature failure.This strip has an IP44 rating, making it unsuitable for outdoor applications.

 Fully Bespoke Cutting Service

 We cut the LED strip to your requested length, solder 15cm cable to the end, heat shrink over the leads for protection, and test the LED strip.

 If you have any specific requirements, such as specific lengths, bridge or corner leads, please email us for a quote.

 As this is a bespoke service, it can take 3 working days to prepare the cuts. If there are many cuts or we think it may take longer than usual, we will try to notify customers of any delays and the expected shipping date. Please note that because this is a bespoke service, orders are non-cancellable and non-returnable.

 


 


 Terms & Conditions:
Bespoke Cutting and Soldering Service for LED Strip
Bespoke Strip Service, please be aware that, due to the customised nature of this service, orders are non-cancellable and non-returnable, and promotional discounts/offers do not apply. Given the bespoke nature, it may take 3 - 5 working days to prepare the cuts. In case of numerous cuts or potential delays, customers will be notified of any extended preparation times and the expected shipping date.

IP44 COB Strip Installation Caution: All Bespoke strip orders undergoes testing before being dispatched. Exercise care and caution when installing the LED strip to avoid damage, as this strip is not waterproof, it does not have a protective layer, so can easily be physically damaged. Please note that the product warranty may become void if the strip is physically bent or damaged during installation. To prevent voltage drop and premature failure, it is advisable to run a maximum of 20 meters continuously. This strip is rated at IP44, rendering it unsuitable for outdoor applications or environments where it is potentially exposed to water.

Bespoke Strip Quotations:
Upon placing the order, the buyer affirms that the product specifications align with their requirements.Uno Lighting, as the seller, disclaims any responsibility for products not meeting customer requirements once the order has been placed.

Electrical Information Disclaimer:
Uno Lighting, the seller, cannot provide information about electrical installation or electrical requirements for any lighting or electrical products.
Buyers are strongly advised to consult a qualified professional before contacting the seller regarding project requirements and seeking technical information about installation and maintenance.
By proceeding with a purchase, the buyer acknowledges and agrees to these terms and conditions.

For a customised strip quotation, kindly email your requirements to sales@uno-lighting.com 


 

 The UK’s first ultra–long-run waterproof spray coating technology. New-generation waterproof protection with no silicone coating or sleeve required. This slim-profile, dotless LED strip maintains its full waterproof rating even when using standard connectors.

 Experience powerful, seamless illumination with this premium commercial-grade 24V LED strip, delivering 8W per meter, 720lm/m, and a warm 3000K glow with CRI 90 for excellent colour accuracy. This strip has an built-in IC, it supports up to 20m continuous runs from a single power input with minimal voltage drop. Featuring 384 LEDs/m, it provides flicker-free, dot-free linear light with no dark spots or short-circuit risk.

 IP65 Indoor Use for Kitchen & Bathroom and compatible with 24V non-dimmable/dimmable constant voltage drivers , its ideal for professional installations requiring bright, consistent performance.

 Long lasting premium LED strip in commercial grade suitable for professional installations. Available in Warm White 3000K, Cool White 4000K

 Dimmable through remote control, Dimmable Drivers or through our smart controller a smart speaker/ device (Sold Separately).

 All Strips cannot be plug direct to the Mains, it will require an 24V Drivers to power.

 This product listing is for LED strip only, power supply/driver are sold separately.

 This item is not supplied with a plug, it is supplied with cables ready for a plug to be fitted or hard wired into the mains supply by a qualified professional

 2 Years Warranty.

 Warranty extended to 3 Years if purchased with our Aluminum Profile. (For optimal performance and to prevent premature failure, we recommend using aluminum extrusion with all LED strip installations.)

 Caution: It is recommended to run a maximum of 20 meters continuously to avoid any voltage drop and premature failure. This IP65 strip is suitable for indoor use only such as Kitchen, Bathroom and all other indoor uses, making it unsuitable for outdoor applications.

 Fully Bespoke Cutting Service

 We cut the LED strip to your requested length, solder 15cm cable to the end, heat shrink over the leads for protection, and test the LED strip.

 If you have any specific requirements, such as specific lengths, bridge or corner leads, please email us for a quote.

 As this is a bespoke service, it can take 3 working days to prepare the cuts. If there are many cuts or we think it may take longer than usual, we will try to notify customers of any delays and the expected shipping date. Please note that because this is a bespoke service, orders are non-cancellable and non-returnable.

description:

 20 Meters Continuous Run Built in IC super length COB strip. Super Long Length, almost no voltage drop for 20 Meters run, it would only need one end power. Linear Light, no dark spot, no short circuit risk.Flicker Free for all 24V constant driver, support PMW.

 8W per Meter, IP44, 3000K Warm Whtie, 384 LEDs per meter, 20 Meters Reel, 24V Super Bright LED Strip, 720m/M, CRI 90, Dimension:10mm x 20000mm. Seamless Light, Dot free array- continuous light output from LED chips, invisible LED chips 


 Long lasting premium LED strip in commercial grade suitable for professional installations. Available in Warm White 2700K, 3000K, Cool White 4000K, Day Light 6000K.

 Dimmable through remote control, Dimmable Drivers or through our smart controller a smart speaker/ device (Sold Separately).

 This item is not supplied with a plug, it is supplied with cables ready for a plug to be fitted or hard wired into the mains supply by a qualified professional

 2 Years Warranty.

 Warranty extended to 3 Years if purchased with our Aluminum Profile. (For optimal performance and to prevent premature failure, we recommend using aluminum extrusion with all LED strip installations.)

 Caution: It is recommended to run a maximum of 20 meterscontinuouslyto avoid any voltage drop and premature failure.This strip has an IP44 rating, making it unsuitable for outdoor applications.

 Fully Bespoke Cutting Service

 We cut the LED strip to your requested length, solder 15cm cable to the end, heat shrink over the leads for protection, and test the LED strip.

Bespoke Cut - Up to 20M Super Length Continuous Run LED COB Strip IP65 8W 3000K Warm White Warm White 3000K / 4.00 Metre - Uno Lighting
description:
For a customised strip quotation, kindly email your requirements to sales@uno-lighting.com 


 20 Meters Continuous Run Built in IC super length COB strip. Super Long Length, almost no voltage drop for 20 Meters run, it would only need one end power. Linear Light, no dark spot, no short circuit risk.Flicker Free for all 24V constant driver, support PMW.

 8W per Meter, IP44, 3000K Warm Whtie, 384 LEDs per meter, 20 Meters Reel, 24V Super Bright LED Strip, 720m/M, CRI 90, Dimension:10mm x 20000mm. Seamless Light, Dot free array- continuous light output from LED chips, invisible LED chips 


 Long lasting premium LED strip in commercial grade suitable for professional installations. Available in Warm White 2700K, 3000K, Cool White 4000K, Day Light 6000K.

 Dimmable through remote control, Dimmable Drivers or through our smart controller a smart speaker/ device (Sold Separately).

 All Strips cannot be plug direct to the Mains, it will require an 24V Drivers to power.

 This product listing is for LED strip only, power supply/driver are sold separately.

 This item is not supplied with a plug, it is supplied with cables ready for a plug to be fitted or hard wired into the mains supply by a qualified professional

 2 Years Warranty.

 Warranty extended to 3 Years if purchased with our Aluminum Profile. (For optimal performance and to prevent premature failure, we recommend using aluminum extrusion with all LED strip installations.)

 Caution: It is recommended to run a maximum of 20 meterscontinuouslyto avoid any voltage drop and premature failure.This strip has an IP44 rating, making it unsuitable for outdoor applications.

 Fully Bespoke Cutting Service

 We cut the LED strip to your requested length, solder 15cm cable to the end, heat shrink over the leads for protection, and test the LED strip.

 If you have any specific requirements, such as specific lengths, bridge or corner leads, please email us for a quote.

 As this is a bespoke service, it can take 3 working days to prepare the cuts. If there are many cuts or we think it may take longer than usual, we will try to notify customers of any delays and the expected shipping date. Please note that because this is a bespoke service, orders are non-cancellable and non-returnable.

 


 


 Terms & Conditions:
Bespoke Cutting and Soldering Service for LED Strip
Bespoke Strip Service, please be aware that, due to the customised nature of this service, orders are non-cancellable and non-returnable, and promotional discounts/offers do not apply. Given the bespoke nature, it may take 3 - 5 working days to prepare the cuts. In case of numerous cuts or potential delays, customers will be notified of any extended preparation times and the expected shipping date.

IP44 COB Strip Installation Caution: All Bespoke strip orders undergoes testing before being dispatched. Exercise care and caution when installing the LED strip to avoid damage, as this strip is not waterproof, it does not have a protective layer, so can easily be physically damaged. Please note that the product warranty may become void if the strip is physically bent or damaged during installation. To prevent voltage drop and premature failure, it is advisable to run a maximum of 20 meters continuously. This strip is rated at IP44, rendering it unsuitable for outdoor applications or environments where it is potentially exposed to water.

Bespoke Strip Quotations:
Upon placing the order, the buyer affirms that the product specifications align with their requirements.Uno Lighting, as the seller, disclaims any responsibility for products not meeting customer requirements once the order has been placed.

Electrical Information Disclaimer:
Uno Lighting, the seller, cannot provide information about electrical installation or electrical requirements for any lighting or electrical products.
Buyers are strongly advised to consult a qualified professional before contacting the seller regarding project requirements and seeking technical information about installation and maintenance.
By proceeding with a purchase, the buyer acknowledges and agrees to these terms and conditions.

For a customised strip quotation, kindly email your requirements to sales@uno-lighting.com 


 

 The UK’s first ultra–long-run waterproof spray coating technology. New-generation waterproof protection with no silicone coating or sleeve required. This slim-profile, dotless LED strip maintains its full waterproof rating even when using standard connectors.

 Experience powerful, seamless illumination with this premium commercial-grade 24V LED strip, delivering 8W per meter, 720lm/m, and a warm 3000K glow with CRI 90 for excellent colour accuracy. This strip has an built-in IC, it supports up to 20m continuous runs from a single power input with minimal voltage drop. Featuring 384 LEDs/m, it provides flicker-free, dot-free linear light with no dark spots or short-circuit risk.

 IP65 Indoor Use for Kitchen & Bathroom and compatible with 24V non-dimmable/dimmable constant voltage drivers , its ideal for professional installations requiring bright, consistent performance.

 Long lasting premium LED strip in commercial grade suitable for professional installations. Available in Warm White 3000K, Cool White 4000K

 Dimmable through remote control, Dimmable Drivers or through our smart controller a smart speaker/ device (Sold Separately).

 All Strips cannot be plug direct to the Mains, it will require an 24V Drivers to power.

 This product listing is for LED strip only, power supply/driver are sold separately.

 This item is not supplied with a plug, it is supplied with cables ready for a plug to be fitted or hard wired into the mains supply by a qualified professional

 2 Years Warranty.

 Warranty extended to 3 Years if purchased with our Aluminum Profile. (For optimal performance and to prevent premature failure, we recommend using aluminum extrusion with all LED strip installations.)

 Caution: It is recommended to run a maximum of 20 meters continuously to avoid any voltage drop and premature failure. This IP65 strip is suitable for indoor use only such as Kitchen, Bathroom and all other indoor uses, making it unsuitable for outdoor applications.

 We cut the LED strip to your requested length, solder 15cm cable to the end, heat shrink over the leads for protection, and test the LED strip.

 If you have any specific requirements, such as specific lengths, bridge or corner leads, please email us for a quote.

 As this is a bespoke service, it can take 3 working days to prepare the cuts. If there are many cuts or we think it may take longer than usual, we will try to notify customers of any delays and the expected shipping date. Please note that because this is a bespoke service, orders are non-cancellable and non-returnable.

description:
For a customised strip quotation, kindly email your requirements to sales@uno-lighting.com


 Product Overview
8W per meter | IP44 | 384 LEDs/m | 20-Meter Reel | 24V | Super Bright LED Strip | 720lm/m | CRI 90
Dimensions: 10mmx 20000mm
Colour Temperature: 4000K Cool White
Super Long 20-Meter Reel with Built-in IC supports up to 20 meters continuous run with almost no voltage drop.
Only one-end power input required for up to 20m continuous installation.
Provides linear, flicker-free light with no dark spots or short-circuit risk.
Compatible with all 24V constant drivers and supports PWM dimming.
Seamless, dot-free illumination from high-density LED chips (invisible chip design).
Premium commercial-grade LED strip, perfect for professional installations.



 Installation & Usage Notes
Maximum continuous run: 20 meters to prevent voltage drop and premature failure.
IP44 rating: For indoor use only; not suitable for outdoor or wet environments.
Supplied without a plug: Ready for connection or hardwiring by a qualified professional.
Handle with care: Avoid bending or pressing on the strip during installation physical damage may void the warranty.

 Terms & Conditions
All strips are tested before dispatch.
This IP44 strip is not waterproof; handle gently to avoid damage.
Maximum continuous run should not exceed 20 meters when connected in longer runs.

title: 20 Metres Reel 8W 3000K LED COB Strip Super Length Up to 20 Metres Continuous Run Strip IP44 Warm White 3000K Warm White 20M - Uno Lighting
20 Metres Reel 8W 3000K LED COB Strip Super Length Up to 20 Metres Continuous Run Strip IP65 Warm White 3000K Warm White 20M - Uno Lighting
description:
For a customised strip quotation, kindly email your requirements to sales@uno-lighting.com


 Product Overview
8W per meter | IP44 | 384 LEDs/m | 20-Meter Reel | 24V | Super Bright LED Strip | 720lm/m | CRI 90
Dimensions: 10mmx 20000mm
Colour Temperature: 3000K Warm White
Super Long 20-Meter Reel with Built-in IC supports up to 20 meters continuous run with almost no voltage drop.
Only one-end power input required for up to 20m continuous installation.
Provides linear, flicker-free light with no dark spots or short-circuit risk.
Compatible with all 24V constant drivers and supports PWM dimming.
Seamless, dot-free illumination from high-density LED chips (invisible chip design).
Premium commercial-grade LED strip, perfect for professional installations.



 Installation & Usage Notes
Maximum continuous run: 20 meters to prevent voltage drop and premature failure.
IP44 rating: For indoor use only; not suitable for outdoor or wet environments.
Supplied without a plug: Ready for connection or hardwiring by a qualified professional.
Handle with care: Avoid bending or pressing on the strip during installation physical damage may void the warranty.

 Terms & Conditions
All strips are tested before dispatch.
This IP44 strip is not waterproof; handle gently to avoid damage.
Maximum continuous run should not exceed 20 meters when connected in longer runs.
By placing an order, the buyer confirms that product specifications meet their requirements.
Uno Lighting is not responsible for issues arising from incorrect product selection or installation.

Uno Lighting cannot provide electrical installation guidance.
All installations must be carried out by a qualified electrician.

description_changes.title: 20 Metres Reel 8W 3000K LED COB Strip Super Length Up to 20 Metres Continuous Run Strip IP65 Warm White 3000K Warm White 20M - Uno Lighting

title: 20 Metres Reel 8W 3000K LED COB Strip Super Length Up to 20 Metres Continuous Run Strip IP44 Warm White 3000K Warm White 20M - Uno Lighting
20 Metres Reel 8W 3000K LED COB Strip Super Length Up to 20 Metres Continuous Run Strip IP65 Warm White 3000K Warm White 20M - Uno Lighting
description:
For a customised strip quotation, kindly email your requirements to sales@uno-lighting.com


 Product Overview
8W per meter | IP44 | 384 LEDs/m | 20-Meter Reel | 24V | Super Bright LED Strip | 720lm/m | CRI 90
Dimensions: 10mmx 20000mm
Colour Temperature: 3000K Warm White
Super Long 20-Meter Reel with Built-in IC supports up to 20 meters continuous run with almost no voltage drop.
Only one-end power input required for up to 20m continuous installation.
Provides linear, flicker-free light with no dark spots or short-circuit risk.
Compatible with all 24V constant drivers and supports PWM dimming.
Seamless, dot-free illumination from high-density LED chips (invisible chip design).
Premium commercial-grade LED strip, perfect for professional installations.



 Installation & Usage Notes
Maximum continuous run: 20 meters to prevent voltage drop and premature failure.
IP44 rating: For indoor use only; not suitable for outdoor or wet environments.
Supplied without a plug: Ready for connection or hardwiring by a qualified professional.
Handle with care: Avoid bending or pressing on the strip during installation physical damage may void the warranty.

 Terms & Conditions
All strips are tested before dispatch.
This IP44 strip is not waterproof; handle gently to avoid damage.
Maximum continuous run should not exceed 20 meters when connected in longer runs.
By placing an order, the buyer confirms that product specifications meet their requirements.
Uno Lighting is not responsible for issues arising from incorrect product selection or installation.
